page.title: 05Hellifield As I'd Like It
page.content: Although Hellifield is a nice village, it would be better if we could have a permanent library so that we could browse through the books. Everyone would like a sports centre with a skating rink, indoor football pitch, table tennis and other games, and a corridor leading to a swimming pool. A park would be a good idea with swings, slides and an adventure playground, a special slide and swings for the babies, and a quiet area with benches for the old people to rest on. Antony would like a lake just outside the village so he could go fishing, and an annual fair with a ghost train, bumper cars and things. More visitors would be attracted by a weekly open air market, some nature walks and an attractive restaurant.
